title: Executive Order 5653-Power-Site Restoration No. 462, Colorado
content: So much of the orders of December 4, 1909, creating Temporary Power-Site Withdrawal No. 81, and July 2, 1910, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 81, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 2 S., R. 73 W., sec. 35, SW. ¼ SW. ¼ SE. ¼.
T. 3 S., R. 73 W., sec. 1, NW. ¼ NW. ¼, S. ½ N. ½ N. ½ S. ½
sec. 2, N. ½ N. ½ SE. ¼.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5653-Power-Site Restoration No. 462, Colorado Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361375
